DERBY-5289 Unable to boot 10.5.1.1 database - fails during soft/hard upgrade process for a new version number while trying to drop jdbc metadata
merged 1140757 from 10.5 branch. For 10.4 the fix for this issue is the relevant part of the DERBY-3870 fix contributed by Knut and separated out by Mamta. The test fix for DERBY-5105 contributed by Knut and the testcase based on the script contributed by Brett Mason.
